review_blob: At home from the bottle. Tart, overly sweet fake lemon flavored beer. Citrus, yeast, lemon drop with a mild beer after taste. Came across as more of a yeasty wine cooler to me. If you like the flavor of lemon drops and sweet drinks then this may appeal to you. I am pouring the rest down the drain.

Ive had worse beer, but I havent had worse beer like this one. Flavor is of over ripe malty (?) bananas that lingers heavily on the palate. Somwht bitter. Heavy, hard to get down. I bought a variety case of Samuel Adams at Sams Club and was cursed with 4 bottles of this. I drank one and used the other three to make banana bread. If you happen to be stuck with this beer, just use it as your liquid in banana bread, dump it down the drain or give it away.

My husbands favorite beer but I do not see the attraction. To me it lacks character and aroma. This, watery, tastes like carbonation, bread, resin, dough, alcohol, cheap beer. It is filling and makes me feel too full too quickly. I can barely get a can of this stuff down.

Tasted more like buttered popcorn to me. Purchased on tap at JerrysPizza in Chillicothe, OH. Dark amber, no head when it arrived. Fragrant and tastes like a cross between a buttered pretzel and buttered popcorn. l really enjoyed this unique beer.
